author: andschwa
body: Please use Hyper V to import the monad linux VM from   schwartzmeyer1 Public magrathea and test it. VSO create date - 12/23/2015 14:05:00

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Tested, and it turned out that there are too many difference among Hyper-V versions (even among the same Windows client version) that proved to be non-viable.

The Nebula team also does not yet support making templated Linux VMs.

By the far the easiest way to preview this project is to just build from source by following the readme. Stock Ubuntu 14.04 VM to local PowerShell is ~10 minutes.

title: Test import of preview VM
